channel.title: CVE Feed for extendthemes -- Colibri WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for extendthemes -- Colibri WP

item.title: CVE-2024-1360|2024-08-01T18:33:25.584Z -- extendthemes -- colibri%20wp
item.description: The Colibri WP theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.94. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the colibriwp_install_plugin() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to install recommended plugins via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-1360|2024-06-04T18:00:57.938Z -- extendthemes -- colibri%20wp
item.description: The Colibri WP theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.94. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to install recommended plugins via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
